= Introduction to Design Patterns=

== Benefits == 
 - Facilitate reuse.
 - Make design easier.
 - Capture expertise and facilitate its dissemination.
 - Define shared vocabulary for discussing design and architecture.
 - Move software development closer to a well-established engineering discipline.
 - Studying them improves your ability to do original designs.
 - Knowing popular designs makes it easier to learn class libraries which use design patterns.

== Intent matters ==
 - Two different design patterns might have the same class diagrams.
 - What makes a design pattern unique is its intent.
 - What distinguishes two patterns is the problem solved.
